Text.Page:
Amazing. Velik was truly with you.

The battle was titanic, and what was left of Harrowhold has been smashed beyond repair...but you stopped Vergos from escaping.

...wait. Do you hear that? Like a low, angry growl...
"I think so..."<TEXTBUTTON>"Is that coming from the cliff edge...?"</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>"Vergos is returning!"</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
